title: Honor level Bugged?
body:
Hello

I have a question. I played recently very much League, but there is a problem which im not getting rid of. Its my Honor level. I am** still Honorlevel 2 **and never got to a higher Level. I **never got a bann** for Flame or something similar. Can someone explain me why? All my friends got to Honorlevel 5 and i am really uncomfortable about this.

Thanks,
and Greetings from Switzerland :)

replies.body: It's true you haven't gotten banned, so I took a look into this and do see some  behavioral factors that can _slow _you down.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you'd like more context, and our PB team will help you out.
